content.rendered:
I want to start posting a CALENDAR of COMING EVENTS every few weeks.  It includes clusters of events happening:

  • EVERY MONTH

  • EVERY WEEK

  • EVERY DAY

Then it lists a CALENDAR of SPECIFIC EVENTS during a period of time.  Here are the “EVERY” clusters and the SPECIFIC EVENTS happening in JANUARY 2023:

CALENDAR — 2023 January

excerpt.rendered: I want to start posting a CALENDAR of COMING EVENTS every few weeks.  It includes clusters of events happening: EVERY MONTH EVERY WEEK EVERY DAY Then it lists a CALENDAR of SPECIFIC EVENTS during a period of time.  Here are the “EVERY” clusters and the SPECIFIC EVENTS happening in JANUARY 2023: CALENDAR — 2023 January

jetpack-related-posts.title: Treaty on the Prohibition of Nuclear Weapons (TPNW):  2nd anniversary of going into effect is Jan. 22, 2023
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Yes, it REALLY IS POSSIBLE to abolish nuclear weapons!!! In July 2017, nearly 2/3 of the nations in the U.N. General Assembly (122 of 193 nations) approved the Treaty on the Prohibition of Nuclear Weapons (TPNW) so it could go out to the world's nations for ratification. By early January…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Nuclear Weapons:  January 2023 events and opportunities
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Many events and opportunities will be occurring in late January 2023 and beyond. Please see many listed in this document: NUCLEAR WEAPONS events in January 2023

jetpack-related-posts.title: CALENDAR of events on many issues from MON NOV 29 through December
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Lots of opportunities here to learn and take action: CALENDAR -- Late November 2021 and beyond
